SEARCH

pirate-text-adventure 1.0-SNAPSHOT API

Packages
Package
Description
org.example.exceptions
The exceptions package contains custom exception classes used throughout the application.
org.example.facade
The facade package provides a simplified interface to interact with the underlying game components.
org.example.json_translator
The json_translator package is responsible for converting game state data to and from JSON format.
org.example.model
This package contains the core model classes for the Pirate Text Adventure game.
org.example.model.entities
This sub-package contains the entity classes used in the Pirate Text Adventure game.
org.example.model.entities.enums
These enums help categorize and manage different types of game states and objects.
org.example.observer
The observer package contains the interfaces for the Observer design pattern.
org.example.pair
The pair package contains utility classes for managing pairs of objects.
org.example.state
This package contains the state pattern implementation for the Pirate Text Adventure game.
org.example.util
The util package contains utility classes and methods used throughout the application.
org.example.view
This package contains the views and handlers (controllers) following the MVC pattern.
org.example.view.handlers
The handlers package manages user interactions with the views.
org.example.view.panels
The panels package contains the graphical user interface components of the game.
